text: Hamba Sauli nakamlonjela Daudi, “Lole, ayu ndo Melabu, mhinza mkulu wa heni, ndokupa hegwe leka umhese, ila ndangukugana hegwe wikangaze na witowe ngondo ya Mkulu Nguluwi.” Sauli nayali yojesa mnhumbula ya heye kota kwa kudita vila, Wafilisti womkopola Daudi, leka yaleche koneka kota nakamkopola kwa moko ga heye yuye.
